plot: A young lady named Judy (Dominique Dunne) begins to doubt herself and love in general as her wedding day approaches. Told in flashbacks through the eyes of the oldest daughter...
title: The Day the Loving Stopped
plot_es: A young lady named Judy (Dominique Dunne) begins to doubt herself and love in general as her wedding day approaches. Told in flashbacks through the eyes of the oldest daughter...
